item.title: Green sofa with wooden legs
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: This green sofa with wooden legs is ideal for modern homes and makes a great addition to any living room. Made from velvet fabric and made to last, the sofa takes its timeless appeal from the fact that it's been manufactured using some of the oldest techniques in the world.

item.title: Comfortable modern chair
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: A perfect chair for your living room, this comfortable chair is made to last. It comes in different color options to fit any decor. The modern frame and comfortable foam provide an easy place to relax after a long day. It's durable, highly functional design makes it great for use both indoors and outdoors at home or the office.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I was nervous purchasing chairs I haven't sat in first but I trusted the reviews and could not be happier!

This chair is perfect! It came in a huge box and wrapped in a foam wrap with a giant synthetic fabric sack around the actual chair. When I got the chair removed from its packaging I was very impressed with how pristine it was. There wasn't a single blemish. It is a really gorgeous neutral beige color that will go nicely with any color sofa. It has a removable bottom cushion and a removable back cushion. It swivels smoothly and rocks just a little bit. It is very comfortable and stylish. It has a retro/modern look that I love.

item.title: Brown wooden kitchen
item.dc:creator: vignette

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I love dark colors and I wanted something regal looking for my kitchen. These were a little difficult to put together just because you really have to angle they just right to put the back of the seats but when all was said and done they look excellent.

item.title: Modern snow white kitchen
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: The white kitchen is a great fit for your family. With an isle in the middle, it can be used to store all your food while you cook and serve it up at the table. A modern kitchen in the style of white wooden cabinets. It has an isle in the middle which makes it perfect for a family of 4 or more. The kitchen also has a large island area and stainless steel appliances like oven microwave fridge sink etc

item.title: Metal frame coffee table
item.dc:creator: vignette

item.title: Decorative coffee tables
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
This modern coffee table is crafted with a black metal frame and wooden top. Its minimalist design blends well with your other home furnishings and makes a versatile addition in any space.
This is a unique and beautiful coffee table, with a metal frame and a wooden top. The mix of modern and vintage with handcrafted details that make this coffee table a true piece of art.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Easy to assemble, decent style and good for small spaces. “Marble” top is definitely … not quality looking if you look close. Opened the package to find the top already chipped 🥴 Was already too committed and in-need of tables to return.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
about our company

We are here to make sure your home is a place where you feel comfortable, at home, and ready to enjoy every moment of everyday life.

About our company

We are an environment-friendly furniture producer. Our goal is to create high-quality furniture using quality materials. Our designers are the best in their respective fields.

get in touch

Hand made furniture with attention to detail

Team of professionals

We can help. Our furniture is designed with the environment in mind, so it's as sustainable as it is stylish. And we don't just make furniture—we also create accessories and home decor items to match our products.

Mary Johnson

CEO / Founder

Peter Kasinski

Marketing Manager

Joyce Grandiosa

Community Manager

Amber Stankov

Lead Designer

It's time to stop thinking about your home in terms of what it looks like and start thinking about what it can do for you. That's why we're here: to make sure your home is a place where you feel comfortable, at home, and ready to enjoy every moment of everyday life!

We can help. Our furniture is designed with the environment in mind, so it's as sustainable as it is stylish. And we don't just make furniture—we also create accessories and home decor items to match our products.

item.title: Bedroom essentials every apartment needs
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
Choosing your bedroom furniture is possibly the most important decision you will make, aside from the new house itself. You’re in this room for at least a quarter of the day, and each piece of furniture you pick makes a significant impact on your health and mood.

Here is an essential tip to help you narrow down the right linens for your bed. Find a comforter that you fall in love with, and work the rest of the sheets around it. In fact, the blanket you choose is possibly the most crucial item on our bedroom essentials list!

The trick is to find a bedside table with drawers and not much surface area along the top. Otherwise, you’ll find ways to clutter it, which depletes the serenity of your room.

Keep the drawers organized and limit what you can see to the bare essentials. A table lamp, alarm clock, your phone charger, and a glass of water should be enough; everything else can go in a drawer.

item.title: Choosing your dining room furniture
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
We’ll get into our big plans in this post (because the good news is that we think we’re on the brink of confidently making some bigger, more permanent renovations to the space!) – but I also want to take you through some of the recent updates that have helped us make the most of our modestly sized kitchen… many of which we haven’t even shown you yet here on the blog. But first…

Minimalism and spartan living rooms are so yesterday. Maximalism is on the rise, as noticed in living rooms worldwide. You can infuse bright colours that are fun and bold through wall paint, rugs or furnishings. If you want to dip your toes in this trend without making an overt commitment, try using a couple of colours in smaller doses. A bright figurine or a playful tapestry should work just fine for those who still support minimalism.

The year 2022 ushered in pastel shades as the answer to minimalist white, beige and grey living rooms. Pastel colours like peach, blush pink and dull lime green are seeing a resurgence in beautiful modern living rooms. Don’t limit yourself to upholstered couches and pale curtains. You could give your doors a facelift or introduce fun window treatments to inject some personality into your beautiful living room.

item.title: Kids bedroom furniture made safe
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
Purpose Of A Kid’s Room

A kid’s room is a multifunctional space where your child can play, sleep and study. It’s also a place they can call their own. As they grow up, the space grows with them. It plays an important role in housing not just their toys and clothes but their imagination, creativity and memories that they can come back to once they are all grown up. So, the interior design of the kid’s room plays a crucial role in building their character and helping them create a space where they feel comfortable and happy. Small details like a spacious and clutter-free room, multifunctional furniture, ample lights and choice of colours go a long way in building the perfect space for your first kid. So, when thinking of building the perfect kid’s room in your home, be mindful of these details and you are good to go.

A Functional Wardrobe: A functional wardrobe is crucial in keeping all your kid’s clothes, toys, books and other knick-knacks. It helps in keeping your kid’s room tidy and saves ample floor space too. 

A Study Corner: Though having a study corner at an early age might seem unnecessary, but trust us, time flies and you will not realise when your child has started going to play school. The initial few years go by in a jiffy. But still, if you don’t want to occupy the space with a full-fledged study corner right now, choose a wardrobe with a study pull-out. This is a sustainable and space-saving option. These won’t take up any extra space, yet keep you ready way ahead of time.

item.title: Sofa ideas for best comfort
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
A Sleeper Sofa For A Large Living Area

You have a lovely modular TV unit that extends into a study and a coffee table seated between accent chairs, but feel your living room needs just a tiny upgrade? Complete the overall aesthetics of your space with a lovely full-size sleeper sofa bed in grey. Pair it with a white faux fur rug underneath. This setup is perfect for large homes that need an extra bed for the night.

Our sleeper sofa

Sleeper Sofa essentials

If you like to get a little adventurous and need to upgrade your bedroom space, you can choose to replace your boxed bed with this tufted queen sleeper sofa. When not in need, you can always fold it back down to a three-seater sofa saving you enough space in the day to run errands around. You can complement this queen sleeper sofa bed with a ceiling-to-floor wardrobe and marble top side tables with lamps on either side of the bed.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Header
item.dc:creator: vignette

item.title: Family comfortable sofa
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: This sofa is extremely comfortable and can sit 6 people. It's a great option for families and big spaces, since it fits comfortably in a corner or open room. The comfortable sofa is a great addition to your home. With 6 seats and a stackable design, it can be placed in a corner or in the middle of the room to provide extra seating for friends. Add this sofa to your living room, family room or den so you can relax on these days when everyone gets together.

item.title: Coffee Table
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: A perfect chair for your living room, this comfortable chair is made to last. It comes in different color options to fit any decor. The modern frame and comfortable foam provide an easy place to relax after a long day. It’s durable, highly functional design makes it great for use both indoors and outdoors at home or the office. This is a unique and beautiful coffee table, with a metal frame and a wooden top. The mix of modern and vintage with handcrafted details that make this coffee table a true piece of art.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The table turned out exactly as it was showed in the picture. Very easy to put together. Satisfied with my purchase.
This table is a nice rustic wood color and came with easy instructions and all materials needed to build. Would recommend.

item.title: Futuristic office chair
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
An office chair with a modern and attractive look, that has the right balance between comfort and style. The leather cushions have extra padding, while the metal frame gives extra support.
Add a sleek touch to your office with our Futuristic Office Chair. Featuring a leather seat and back, this chair features a durable metal frame for added support. The leather cushions are compatible with all desks, so you can move or change furniture as needed.

item.title: Classic style kitchen cabinets
item.dc:creator: vignette

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I needed more kitchen space and counter top with my apartment being so long and small, which i love, so I bought this unite and OMG what a life saver. All i need to cook in one space, you can move it as needed, has wheels that lock. I am going to add a thin butchers block on the top to protect it since i am using it for cooking but other then that it works amazing for my needs.
Love the design, but when it arrived (from USA to UK) there were 4 missing parts! So had to send back. Not impressed

item.title: Italian imported modern kitchen
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: This kitchen is designed for those who seek modern style. You will get a good storage space with the different style cabinets. It is made of MDF which makes it sturdy and environmentally friendly. Our designs also look beautiful on your walls The Italian kitchen is a product of design and style. A combination of classic, timeless designs with contemporary trends make this product unique in its class. While adding functional storage to your home through the design and generous cabinet space, our Italian kitchen will compliment and accentuate any room.

item.title: Wooden bar chair
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded:
This wooden bar chair is a great addition to your kitchen space or outside area. Made from wood it will add a rustic style to your home or anywhere this is used.
Check out more of our products that make a great combination with this item.

item.title: Vintage green chair
item.dc:creator: vignette
item.content:encoded: The modern office chair is made of leather and metal. The comfortable cushion, which is made of seat foam and support cushion in the back and seat are pillow, allows you to sit in a comfortable position. The ergonomic design of the chair promotes blood circulation and frees pressure on your body so that you can sit there for a long time.
